p: In addition, significant differences in the relative contents of myrcene, (+)/(−)-β-pinene, p-cymene, (−)-bornylacetate, (−)-verbenone and α-humulene were observed between the two cortex samples of different ages ( Figure 3). All these terpenes showed significantly higher concentrations in the young cortical tissue samples than the mature ones, with the only exception being (+)/(−)-β-pinene.
